terms_and_conditions.eligibility: In order to adopt a pet through our service, you must be over the age of 18 and able to provide a safe and loving home for the animal.
terms_and_conditions.fees: There is a non-refundable fee of $50 to adopt a pet through our service. This fee covers the cost of medical exams, vaccinations, and other necessary treatments.
terms_and_conditions.return_policy: If for any reason you are unable to provide a suitable home for the pet you have adopted, you must return the animal to our service within 30 days. You will be refunded the adoption fee minus a $25 processing fee.
terms_and_conditions.maintenance: It is your responsibility to provide adequate food, water, shelter, and medical care for the pet you have adopted. Failure to do so may result in the animal being taken from your care.
terms_and_conditions.liability: Our service is not responsible for any injuries or damages caused by the pet you have adopted. You are responsible for ensuring the safety of yourself, others, and the animal in your care.
